text: Motion
Motion
Motion

That'll do it for Ikuta-san's song recording!
Good work today!
Thank you very much...!

Haruki-chan's singing
is really full of emotions, isn't it──!

Eh...! Really～?
I'm so happy....
I do think about a lot a things while singing I guess.

...A lot of things...
Like what?

Umm. let's see...
Like about the meaning of the lyrics.

If it were me in the situation of this song,
what would I be feeling?

I think "Hanamuke No Hanataba"
is a song sung about parting...
Reallyー?
Ah, I could be wrong about it though...!

Ahah, I didn't mean that. I just hadn't really
thought that deeply about the meaning.

ーBy the way, when you're thinking about parting.
Is it something you've personally experienced, Haruki-chan...?

Well... I guess you could say that 
but it's more than that too, I guess?

So many things change over time, so in a way
we've all experienced separation in some way.

It's not only about our connections to people or environments 
but also about the saying farewell to your past self...

But you know, it doesn't always have to be a sad thing.
I think that there are also good things that come from separations.

I want to collect all of those thoughts into a boquet that I send 
through this song... Not matter what partings may be to come.

Fufu,
I guess that's what I was thinking...!
...Ehh
